author: Guest
title: More questions
text:
- What if several features are developed in parallel within its own branches, when to merge them?
- How to minimize merge conflicts?
- Wouldn't is be good to define sync points at sprint ends, and try to avoid feature definition that take longer then the sprint duration by splitting them up into smaller feature chunks?
- What about QA, how can a scrum based SVN strategy support reducing idle times while the code is being tested?
